member.summary: Provides a cache to manage all Trello objects.

member.summary: Specifies whether deleted items should be removed from the cache. The default is true.

member.summary: Provides logging for Manatee.Trello. The default log writes to the Console window.

member.name: P:Manatee.Trello.TrelloConfiguration.JsonFactory
member.summary: Provides a factory which is used to create instances of JSON objects.

member.name: P:Manatee.Trello.TrelloConfiguration.ThrowOnTrelloError
member.summary: Specifies whether the service should throw an exception when an error is received from Trello. Default is true.

member.name: P:Manatee.Trello.TrelloConfiguration.ChangeSubmissionTime
member.summary: Specifies a length of time an object holds changes before it submits them. The timer is reset with every change. Default is 100 ms.
member.remarks: Setting a value of 0 ms will result in instant upload of changes, dramatically increasing call volume and slowing performance.

member.name: P:Manatee.Trello.TrelloConfiguration.RefreshThrottle
member.summary: Specifies a length of time during which a single entity can only be refreshed once. Default is 5 seconds.
member.remarks: Setting a value of 0 will result in immediately consecutive or parallel calls both going through to Trello.

member.name: P:Manatee.Trello.TrelloConfiguration.RetryStatusCodes
member.summary: Specifies which HTTP response status codes should trigger an automatic retry.

member.name: P:Manatee.Trello.TrelloConfiguration.MaxRetryCount
member.summary: Specifies a maximum number of retries allowed before an error is thrown.

member.name: P:Manatee.Trello.TrelloConfiguration.DelayBetweenRetries
member.summary: Specifies a delay between retry attempts.

member.name: P:Manatee.Trello.TrelloConfiguration.RetryPredicate
member.summary: Specifies a predicate to execute to determine if a retry should be attempted. The default simply uses and .
member.remarks:
Parameters:
- - The response object from the REST provider. Will need to be cast to the appropriate type. - - The number of retries attempted.
Return value:
- - True if the call should be retried; false otherwise.
